caption.p: Extent of occurrence of the Atlantic Forest and Cerrado hotspots of biodiversity conservation in South America. Source: originally downloaded from the Conservation International portal ( http://www.conservation.org/where/priority_areas/hotspots/Documents/CI_Biodiversity-Hotspots_2011_ArcView-Shapefile-and-Metadata.zip), currently available at http://www.cepf.net/SiteAssets/hotspots_2016_1.zip
